categories: Category:Imperial-class Star Destroyers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: The Stalwart was an Imperial-class Star Destroyer in service of the Imperial Navy during the reign of the Galactic Empire. Part of the One Twenty-Fifth task force, it served as the flagship of Admiral Kinshara, who was dispatched by the Imperial High Command to Denash in order to suppress the elements of a sector-wide insurgency.
